itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, September 17, 2013
contentencoded: Members of the Fed's Open Market Committee meet this week and may decide to scale back on bond-buying stimulus spending.  John Silvia, chief economist at Wells Fargo, joins Marketplace Morning Report host David Brancaccio to discuss.
title: Traders expect Federal Reserve to scale back on bond buying
description: The Fed may scale back on stimulus spending.
contenttemplated:
